"The way of the transgressor is hard," but wisdom's "ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace."  In the downward road the gateway 
                                                                           155
may be bright with flowers, but there are thorns in the path.  The light of hope which shines from its entrance fades into the darkness of despair; and the soul who follows that path descends into the shadows of unending night.
